title: Topic 001 Question 194
body: A company wants to run production workloads on AWS. The company wants access to technical support from engineers 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. The company also wants access to the AWS Health API and contextual architectural guidance for business use cases. The company has a strong IT support team and does not need concierge support.
Which AWS Support plan will meet these requirements at the LOWEST cost?
